Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-grey pottery vessel, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of two lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393801) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393801)
Frankfort 1933 / The Cenotaph of Seti I at Abydos (no. 10)
Almásy-Martin 2020 / Demotic, Greek and Coptic ostraca from Abydos in the British Museum (no.16)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.BM Abydos Dem. 16 (Edition abbreviation according to Oates et al. 2001)
